User.task_description: Follow the instructions and comments of the MTurk bot.
linear_guide: Your name is Tony. Say hello to your AI assistant!
You are on a train to the Central Station and need to book a ride from there to your hotel.
You might need your hotel name: its Hilton in the center of town. Also, you prefer Lyft rides.

You just remember that last time you took a Lyft, the driver was a bit annoying. So when you book the ride, make sure your driver is not Mark. If you have already booked, request a change. If you are booking right now, ask if Mark is the driver and, if so, request another.

You get a text from the hotel. The waterline broke and unfortunately they cannot accommodate you tonight. Be creative! Perhaps your assistant can find another hotel in the center for you? You'll also have to change your ride...
When you look for accommodation, make sure that they offer room service. You you don't have to book it.
You just arrived at the Central Station. Find out how far out your ride is (unless you cancelled it).
Good! Bring the conversation to a natural end in the next few turns.

Wizard.task_description: Help the user on his/her journey. (You can find the single-task video tutorial under https://youtu.be/USrWF1ZyNWw, in case you want to watch it again.)
completion_questions: ...change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
...become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue?
